comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913, Edward Lauterbach was defense attorney in the trial of David Lamar, the famed "Wolf of Wall Street." In 1914, it was revealed that Lauterbach had been fingered as a co-conspirator with Lamar. www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3681839897/in/p...

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Wystan: Thanks for finding the connection between Lamar and Lauterbach.  We will include it in the description when we update the database.
